name: amc12a_2021_p18_1
header:
import Mathlib
import Aesop
set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat
set_option pp.instanceTypes true
set_option pp.numericTypes true
set_option pp.coercions.types true
set_option pp.letVarTypes true
set_option pp.structureInstanceTypes true
set_option pp.instanceTypes true
set_option pp.mvars.withType true
set_option pp.coercions true
set_option pp.funBinderTypes true
set_option pp.piBinderTypes true
formal_statement:
lemma amc12a_2021_p18_1
  (f : ℚ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < x → ∀ (y : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < y → f (x * y) = f x + f y)
  (h₁ : ∀ (p : ℕ), Nat.Prime p → f (↑p : ℚ) = (↑p : ℝ)) :
  f (1 : ℚ) = (0 : ℝ) := by

name: amc12a_2021_p18_2
header:

set_option pp.instanceTypes true

set_option pp.funBinderTypes true
set_option pp.piBinderTypes true
formal_statement:
lemma amc12a_2021_p18_2
  (f : ℚ → ℝ)
  (x : ℚ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < x → ∀ (y : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < y → f (x * y) = f x + f y)
  (h₁ : ∀ (p : ℕ), Nat.Prime p → f (↑p : ℚ) = (↑p : ℝ))
  (f_one : f (1 : ℚ) = (0 : ℝ))
  (hx : (0 : ℚ) < x) :
  f x⁻¹ = -f x := by

name: amc12a_2021_p18_3
header:
import Mathlib
import Aesop
set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat
set_option pp.instanceTypes true
set_option pp.numericTypes true
set_option pp.coercions.types true
set_option pp.letVarTypes true
set_option pp.structureInstanceTypes true
set_option pp.instanceTypes true
set_option pp.mvars.withType true
set_option pp.coercions true
set_option pp.funBinderTypes true
set_option pp.piBinderTypes true
formal_statement:
lemma amc12a_2021_p18_3
  (f : ℚ → ℝ)
  (p n : ℕ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < x → ∀ (y : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < y → f (x * y) = f x + f y)
  (h₁ : ∀ (p : ℕ), Nat.Prime p → f (↑p : ℚ) = (↑p : ℝ))
  (f_one : f (1 : ℚ) = (0 : ℝ))
  (f_inv : ∀ (x : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < x → f x⁻¹ = -f x)
  (hp : Nat.Prime p)
  (ih : f ((↑p : ℚ) ^ n) = (↑n : ℝ) * (↑p : ℝ)) :
  f ((↑p : ℚ) * (↑p : ℚ) ^ n) = (↑n : ℝ) * (↑p : ℝ) + (↑p : ℝ) := by

name: amc12a_2021_p18_4

set_option pp.coercions true
set_option pp.funBinderTypes true
set_option pp.piBinderTypes true
formal_statement:
lemma amc12a_2021_p18_4
  (f : ℚ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < x → ∀ (y : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < y → f (x * y) = f x + f y)
  (h₁ : ∀ (p : ℕ), Nat.Prime p → f (↑p : ℚ) = (↑p : ℝ))
  (f_one : f (1 : ℚ) = (0 : ℝ))
  (f_inv : ∀ (x : ℚ), (0 : ℚ) < x → f x⁻¹ = -f x)
  (f_pow : ∀ (p n : ℕ), Nat.Prime p → f ((↑p : ℚ) ^ n) = (↑n : ℝ) * (↑p : ℝ)) :
  f (25 : ℚ) = (10 : ℝ) := by
